page.title: 10Bicycle Riding
page.content: I go{biking}with my friends. Maybe we will go up Pillbridge Lane where there are two dens that we can play in. On the{bridge}there is a little {ramp}to race over and when it has rained there may be some{skid patches for us to skid on. Behind the Jet garage there is a{scramble course}with sharp bends and a ramp ,a seasaw and three steep hills.The problem there is to stay on your bike! At school we take a{cycling {proficiency test.}We have to learn the {Highway Code}for a written test and then we must cycle around the village while the examiners are watching us.It is good when you pass because you feel safer riding your bike on the busy roads;but I still like to come off the roads and play stunts with my friends!
